category: Member Sports Organization Regulations/Article 28 (Status and Name)
contents: Article 28 (Status and Name) ① City/provincial sports organizations are members of member sports organizations and have their own unique names indicating each city/provincial unit. Revised August 7, 2017 ② City/provincial sports organizations must join the city/provincial sports association as members, and in principle, their offices should be located at the location of the city/provincial sports association. ③ City/provincial sports organizations may have each city/county/district sports organization as members upon resolution at the general meeting of the city/provincial sports organization. Revised 2017. 3. 23.
